bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Guide for DC Inclined Plane Tracking and Erosion Test for Outdoor Insulation Applications
IEEE Draft Guide for DC Inclined Plane Tracking and Erosion Test for Outdoor Insulation Applications

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: The various important aspects that need to be considered are described for the reliable evaluation of the tracking and erosion resistances of polymeric outdoor insulating materials using the inclined plane tracking and erosion DC voltages.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.keyword: the inclined plane tracking and erosion test
